short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search both MDN and NPM from the url omnibox.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Search MDN and NPM from the url omnibox.

In the url bar, start a search with 'mmm <term>'.

The highest-ranked results from Mozilla's MDN and npm's search will populate in the results list.

Visit https://github.com/geuis/mdn-npm to contribute or file an issue.
